sentences.en: The spectacular sunrise made us exclaim in surprise.
sentences.cn: 壮观的日出让我们惊叹不已。

sentences.en: That's why you exclaim "Ouch" after staying away from the pain signals you encountered before.
sentences.cn: 那就是为什么你远离开始遇到的疼痛信号后才惊叫“哎呦”的原因。

sentences.en: Could we render this inimitable picture properly, then would everybody exclaim, "Beautiful, unparalleled Italy!"
sentences.cn: 如果我们能把这幅独一无二的图画恰当地描绘出来，那么人人都会惊叹：“美丽无比的意大利！”
